title: Season 2 is Now Live!
content: The highly anticipated Season 2 has arrived with new legends, challenges, and rewards! Explore new maps, unlock exclusive skins, and compete in seasonal tournaments.
author: Dalarnia Team

title: Patch 1.3.0 Notes
content: Balance changes, bug fixes, and new features in this patch. We've adjusted several legends to improve gameplay balance and fixed critical bugs reported by the community.
author: Dev Team

title: Beginner's Guide to Dalarnia Legends
content: Everything you need to know to start your journey in Dalarnia Legends. Learn about deck building, legend synergies, and basic strategies to dominate the battlefield.
author: Community

title: Halloween Event Announcement
content: Get ready for our spooky Halloween event! Collect exclusive Halloween-themed legends and earn special rewards. Event runs from October 25th to November 5th.
author: Event Team

title: Новая легенда: Звездный Страж
content: Представляем новую легендарную карту - Звездный Страж! Этот могущественный защитник космоса обладает уникальными способностями контроля поля боя.
author: Dalarnia Team
